example.context:
DappNode - Shopify Store
Receive Shopify proceeds into your multi-signature wallet.
See Example Integrate Now

DappNode uses the DePay Shopify Plugin to receive payments peer-to-peer, directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers benefit from a seamless payment experience and an on-the-fly token conversion.

Checkout with DePay

After selecting the DappNode of their choice, customers can select DePay upon checkout to pay directly with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet.

DAppNode receives the payment directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet.

See Example Integrate Now

interactions.response: DappNode provides customers with the ability to pay with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet directly into the Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers can also benefit from an on-the-fly token conversion.
DePay is supported on Shopify, WooCommerce, Wordpress, and other web3 products.

The DEPAY Token is a cryptocurrency token created by DePay AG and used for DePay payments. It is an ERC-20 (Ethereum Request for Comments) token that is used to process payments, donations and other transactions across the DePay network.

responses: DAppNode is a simple platform for deploying and hosting DApps, P2P clients, and blockchain nodes. It provides a user-friendly way to set up and configure nodes with a couple of clicks. It is also a one-click setup tool for PoS network/chain validators, this includes support for Gnosis chain mainnet and chiado testnet. Sedge takes care of the entire on-premise full node setup based on the chosen client, using generated docker-compose scripts based on the desired configuration. With ValidateGnosis, you can start validating in the Gnosis blockchain in a few easy steps.

DAppNode supports a wide range of blockchain protocols, including Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin (BTC), Dogecoin (DOGE), Monero (XMR), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lightning Network (LND), Grin (GRIN) and Filecoin (FIL). Additionally, it also supports tokenized assets like ERC20 tokens, ERC721 tokens and BEP2 tokens.

The DEPAY token unlocks professional tools to manage Web3 payments and allows token holders to govern the DePay payment protocol. DEPAY tokens have been allocated for project development and marketing, conducted by DePay AG Switzerland, to establish basic protocols, additional functionalities and utilities, especially DePay PRO. The tokens are used for governance purposes, to reward early usage of the DEPAY protocol and products, and to create an extensive incentive for integrators to use DePay as a payment protocol. DEPAY tokens are available on exchanges such as PancakeSwap and Uniswap.
